original: EINERTII, Eric Gustaf Einar, Direktör, Mariestad, f Renneslöf, Hall län, 15/3 90 av Carl Petersson o Anna Johansson, gm Elisabeth Whitefield. Kont.ch AB Frick & Oldny, Malmö, 19—24, kamr systembol Halmst 24—38, disp systembol Falköp 38, vkst dir systemAB, Mariest, förest Skarab läns kristidsstyr kontr.byrå sed. 40. Styr.led Skarab läns nykt.-nmdrs centr.org, led nykt.nnidn i Mariest, Istlöjtu, ordf Mariest Istfrn ungd.avd U 60, styr.suppl Mariestads Istfrn. Frimurare, W6, NN, 7.B; IstSM. Hobby: Trädg.odl.
translated: EINERTII, Eric Gustaf Einar, Director, Mariestad, born in Renneslöf, Halland County, on March 15, 1890, to Carl Petersson and Anna Johansson, married to Elisabeth Whitefield. Worked as a accountant at AB Frick & Oldny, Malmö, from 1919 to 1924, then as a clerk at Systembolaget in Halmstad from 1924 to 1938, followed by a position as a dispatcher at Systembolaget in Falköping in 1938. Became a Deputy Managing Director at SystemAB in Mariestad and managed the contracting office of Skaraborg County during the war from 1940 until now. Serves on the board of the Skaraborg County Temperance Movement's Central Organization and is a board member of the Temperance Association in Mariestad. He is also the Chairman of the Mariestad Youth Department of the Swedish Temperance Association and a substitute board member of the Mariestad Temperance Society. He is a Freemason (W6, NN, 7.B) and has received the First Class Military Service Medal. Hobbies include gardening.
